Name: PipelineMetricsCards
Description: Displays key pipeline metrics in a grid of interactive cards

Properties.Name: metrics
Properties.Description: Object containing totalValue, activeCount, winRate, avgDealSize, avgCycleTime

Properties.Name: onCardClick
Properties.Description: Callback when a metric card is clicked

Events.Name: onMetricClick
Events.Description: Fired when a metric card is clicked

Parameters.Name: metricType
Parameters.Description: Type of metric clicked (pipeline, active, won)

FunctionalRequirements:
- Display 5 key metrics: Pipeline Value, Active Deals, Win Rate, Avg Deal Size, Avg Cycle Time
- Make Pipeline Value, Active Deals, and Win Rate cards clickable
- Format currency values appropriately (K/M notation)
- Show hover effects on clickable cards
- Pass filtered deals to callback on click
TechnicalDesign: Component renders a responsive grid of metric cards. Uses formatCurrency helper for value formatting. Implements hover states with transform and shadow effects. Filters deals based on metric type before passing to callback.
